title: Who is Iggy Azalea's new man? - Quora

response.answer_text: Playboi Carti Iggy Azalea's boyfriend, Playboi Carti, was arrested for being in possession of guns and drugs in Clayton County, Georgia. Carti (real name Jordan Carter), 23, was pulled over in a Lamborghini with an expired tag on Thursday, April 2, according to a press release from the Clayton County Sheriff's Office.Apr 3, 2020
